verses.verse: Come near,<WH7126> you nations,<WH1471> to hear!<WH8085> Listen,<WH7181> you peoples.<WH3816> Let the earth<WH776> and all it contains<WH4393> hear;<WH8085> the world,<WH8398> and everything that comes from it.<WH6631>

For Yahweh<WH3068> is enraged<WH7110> against all the nations,<WH1471> and angry<WH2534> with all their armies.<WH6635> He has utterly destroyed<WH2763> them.<WH5414> He has given them over for slaughter.<WH2874>
Their slain<WH2491> will also be cast out,<WH7993> and the stench<WH889> of their dead bodies<WH6297> will come up;<WH5927> and the mountains<WH2022> will melt<WH4549> in their blood.<WH1818>

All of the army<WH6635> of the sky<WH8064> will be dissolved.<WH4743> The sky<WH8064> will be rolled up<WH1556> like a scroll,<WH5612> and all its armies<WH6635> will fade away,<WH5034> as a leaf<WH5929> fades from off<WH5034> a vine<WH1612> or<WH5034> a fig tree.<WH8384>
For my sword<WH2719> has drunk<WH7301> its fill in the sky.<WH8064> Behold,<WH3381> it will come down on Edom,<WH123> and on the people<WH5971> of my curse,<WH2764> for judgment.<WH4941>

Yahweh<WH3068>'s sword<WH2719> is filled<WH4390> with blood.<WH1818> It is covered<WH2459> with fat,<WH1878> with the blood<WH1818> of lambs<WH3733> and goats,<WH6260> with the fat<WH2459> of the kidneys<WH3629> of rams;<WH352> for Yahweh<WH3068> has a sacrifice<WH2077> in Bozrah,<WH1224> And a great<WH1419> slaughter<WH2874> in the land<WH776> of Edom.<WH123>

The wild oxen<WH7214> will come down<WH3381> with them,<WH6499> and the young bulls with the mighty bulls;<WH47> and their land<WH776> will be drunken<WH7301> with blood,<WH1818> and their dust<WH6083> made greasy<WH1878> with fat.<WH2459>
For Yahweh<WH3068> has a day<WH3117> of vengeance,<WH5359> a year<WH8141> of recompense<WH7966> for the cause<WH7379> of Zion.<WH6726>
Its streams<WH5158> will be turned<WH2015> into pitch,<WH2203> its dust<WH6083> into sulfur,<WH1614> And its land<WH776> will become burning<WH1197> pitch.<WH2203>

It won't<WH3518> be quenched night<WH3915> nor day.<WH3119> Its smoke<WH6227> will go up<WH5927> forever.<WH5769> From generation<WH1755> to generation,<WH1755> it will lie waste.<WH2717> No one will pass through<WH5674> it forever<WH5331> and ever.<WH5331>

But the pelican<WH6893> and the porcupine<WH7090> will possess<WH3423> it.<WH3244> The owl and the raven<WH6158> will dwell<WH7931> in it.<WH5186> He will stretch the line<WH6957> of confusion<WH8414> over it,<WH6957> and the plumb line of emptiness.<WH922>
They shall call<WH7121> its nobles<WH2715> to the kingdom,<WH4410> but none shall be there;<WH8269> and all its princes shall be nothing.<WH657>

Thorns<WH5518> will come up<WH5927> in its palaces,<WH759> nettles<WH7057> and thistles<WH2336> in its fortresses;<WH4013> and it will be a habitation<WH5116> of jackals,<WH8577> a court<WH2681> for ostriches.<WH1323>

The wild animals of the desert<WH6728> will meet<WH6298> with the wolves,<WH338> and the wild goat<WH8163> will cry<WH7121> to his fellow.<WH7453> Yes,<WH3917> the night creature shall settle<WH7280> there,<WH4672> and shall find herself a place of rest.<WH4494>

The arrow snake<WH7091> will make her nest<WH7077> there,<WH4422> and lay, hatch,<WH1234> and gather<WH1716> under her shade.<WH6738> Yes,<WH1772> the kites will be gathered<WH6908> there,<WH802> every one with her mate.<WH7468>

Search in<WH1875> the book<WH5612> of Yahweh,<WH3068> and read:<WH7121> not one<WH259> of these<WH2007> will be missing.<WH5737> none<WH802> will lack<WH6485> her mate.<WH7468> For my mouth<WH6310> has commanded,<WH6680> and his Spirit<WH7307> has gathered them.<WH6908>

He has cast<WH5307> the lot<WH1486> for them,<WH3027> and his hand has divided<WH2505> it to them with a measuring line.<WH6957> They shall possess<WH3423> it forever.<WH5769> <WH5704> From generation<WH1755> to generation<WH1755> they will dwell in it.<WH7931>
